ComicInfo.Summary:
The LAPD headquarters has been destroyed and the city is in chaos!
Fanatic replicant leader Yutonâ€™s call to arms has turned Los Angeles into a warzone. Now Ash and her lover Freysa are on the run, hounded by replicants and Blade Runners. With time running out for both sides, Ash finds herself on a collision course with Yotun!
